description: Rocket.Chat is a communication platform that enables team collaboration through messaging, audio/video calls, and integrations, all customizable and self-hostable.
name: rocketchat
title: Rocketchat

actions.description: Send messages to users on your workspace.
actions.name: sendDirectMessage

properties.description: Username to send the direct message to.
properties.name: username
properties.label: Username

actions.title: Send Direct Message

actions.description: Send messages to channel on your workspace.
actions.name: sendChannelMessage

properties.description: Channel name to send the message to.
properties.name: name
properties.label: Channel Name

actions.title: Send Channel Message

properties.description: An array of the users to be added to the channel when it is created.
properties.name: members
properties.label: Members

properties.description: Set if the channel is read only or not.
properties.name: readOnly
properties.label: Read Only

properties.description: If set to true, the user calling the endpoint is not automatically added as a member of the channel.
properties.name: excludeSelf
properties.label: Exclude Self

triggers.description: Trigger off whenever a new message is posted to any public channel, private group or direct messages.
triggers.name: newMessage
triggers.title: New Message
